$Charlie Wilson injured his leg when he fell at 3B

$Grounder to pitcher and Orsatti caught in rundown between 2nd and 3rd, returning safely to 2nd as batter King also arrived at that base; 3bman Hack tagged them both and both runners left base; umpire ruling was that batter was out first since base belonged to Orsatti who was then out when left the base and was tagged
